ModMetaData.name: Smart Work Mode
ModMetaData.author: 1trickPwnyta
ModMetaData.description:
Mechs in Work mode waste a lot of energy wandering around idly when there is no work for them to do. This mod adds a new work mode for mechs called Smart Work. Smart Work functions the same as Work but with the following differences: - There is no patrol activity for combat mechs. - When idle, mechs go into self-shutdown (similar to Self Shutdown mode) to recharge slowly, but will wake back up when more work becomes available. - You can set an area (per control group) for idle self-shutdown in the Mechs tab. Mechs will move to that area before shutting down to charge.
=== Updates === 09/03/2025: Fix bugs related to remembering self charge areas on gravships 07/29/2025: Add support for gravships and self charge areas attached to them when launching, fix save data bug 06/17/2025: Update to 1.6
